alert.note: Alert for Murray; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Murray, southern Whitfield and southeastern Walker Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Villanow, or 8 miles southwest of Dalton, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Tunnel Hill, Mill Creek, Villanow, Rocky Face, Tilton and North Georgia Speedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
